document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">healed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">shows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">shallow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">scar </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">confidential </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">moan </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">mended </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">Mortality </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">Fabrics </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">truly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">torn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">convalescent </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">shameless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">More </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">genuine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">perfidy </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">Fidelity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The healed heart shows it's shallow scar
